name: Adorii
tag_list: ecommerce, bridal, wedding, flash-sale-site, seattle-based, start-up, tech-start-up
description: Sales Events for the Engaged and Invited
overview:
Adorii.com (formerly Wedcoupon) , is the recently launched premiere daily sales event ecommerce site for the engaged and invited. Shop covetable wed-fashions, products, services and inspirations for up to 80% OFF retail - more of what you Adore.

Adorii is redefining the bridal industry, which is annually estimated to be worth $56B in the US. We are first to market and best in class with this concept. Wedcoupon is a commerce members-only daily sales events site that targets engaged couples; it’s dedicated to providing them with their dream wedding for less. We partner with top vendors (national and local cities to be launched in Washington DC, Seattle, San Francisco, New York, Chicago, Los Angeles, Miami and Atlanta in the near future) and merchants to deliver steep discounts to our engaged couples, family members and attendants.

Adorii provides a cadre of curated sales events: venues, photographers, honeymoon travel, apparel (wedding dresses, tuxes, bridesmaids wear), gifts, accessories, pre-event supplies, and décor. All things wedding: as long as it’s on-trend and affordable it could be offered to our members.

Adorii is led by a combination of successful entrepreneurs, bridal industry leaders, bridal publishers (print and online media), and a veteran merchant team. We are committed to surrounding ourselves with the most talented individuals in the industry. Adorii is positioned to be a game changer in a tradition-bound industry that has not yet seen great leaps in client-oriented deals and services. To learn more visit – www.adorii.com.

Investor opportunities available please contact – investor@adorii.com

Engage With Us On… facebook.com/shopadorii twitter.com/shop_adorii pinterest.com/adorii Instagram - @shop_adorii Google Plus

Adorii - Sales Events for the Engaged and Invited - More of what you Adore!
